page.title: 18A Typical Dairy Farmer
page.content: Mr.Thomas Trainer of Byretown Farm is a typical dairy farmer in this area. He has 150 cows mostly Freisians.Mr. Trainer has four hundred acres,fifty acres are used for permanent pasture and two hundred and used for grass, crops etc.He has all types of machinery.Today he has an up_to_date milking process where the cows'udders are washed before being milked.Sixteen cows could be milked at one time.Mr. Trainer sells seed pototoes and he also sells grown pototoes.He works very long hours in the summer.Spring is the busiest time of the year because he has to gather in crops.He has owned the farm for about thirty years. It is a family business. Mrs Trainer is very active in the Woman's Rural Institute.
